title: Landfire.jl
text:
Overview
Welcome to the documentation for Landfire.jl.
Landfire.jl is a Julia client for the LANDFIRE Product Service API. It provides tools to query, download, and process LANDFIRE geospatial data products used in wildfire and vegetation analysis.

title: Landfire.jl
text:
Quickstart

using Landfire

# Browse available products
prods = Landfire.products(layer="FBFM13")

title: Getting Started
text:
Setup
The LANDFIRE API requires an email address. Set it via environment variable:
Consider adding this to ~/.julia/config/startup.jl for persistence.

title: Getting Started
text:
Basic Usage
using Landfire

# Check that API is running
Landfire.healthcheck()

# Browse available products
prods = Landfire.products()                    # All latest products
prods = Landfire.products(theme="Fuel")        # Filter by theme
prods = Landfire.products(layer="FBFM13")      # Filter by layer name

# Create a Dataset for an area of interest
data = Landfire.Dataset(prods, "-105.5 39.5 -105.0 40.0")  # xmin ymin xmax ymax

# Download and extract (results are cached)
tif_file = get(data)

# List all extracted files
Landfire.files(data)

# Get attribute table for a layer
table = Landfire.attribute_table("FBFM13")

title: API
text:
Example
url = Landfire.full_product_url("FBFM13")
size = Landfire.filesize(url)
@info Base.format_bytes(size)

title: API
text:
Example
url = Landfire.full_product_url("FBFM13", "CONUS", 2024)
# "https://landfire.gov/data-downloads/CONUS_LF2024/LF2024_FBFM13_CONUS.zip"

# Or from a Product (extracts layer name and year from product)
prod = Landfire.products(layer="FBFM13")[1]
url = Landfire.full_product_url(prod, "CONUS")

title: API
text:
Keyword Arguments

refresh::Bool=false - Set to true to refresh the cached product list from the API

Filter products by field values. Boolean fields use exact matching, string fields use substring matching.

name::String
theme::String
layer::String
version::String
conus::Bool
ak::Bool
hi::Bool
geoAreas::String

title: API
text:
Examples
products(conus=true)              # Only CONUS products
products(theme="Fuels")           # Products with "Fuels" in theme
products(layer="FBFM13")          # Products with "FBFM13" in layer name
products(conus=true, ak=false)    # CONUS only, not Alaska
products(refresh=true)            # Refresh cache and return all latest products
